name: Shooter (jgittins)
description:
An idea I've been working on for an arcade scrolling shooter that has open world and loot elements. You fly from star to star destroying enemies to earn credits and loot crates. You can spend credits to buy better ships and weapons.

Works best in chrome with a dual analog game controller like the 360 or PS4 controllers.

Keyboard Controls:

WASD or Arrow keys to move the ship

Q and E will barrel roll the ship making it possible to dodge enemy bullets

P to pause the game

Mouse to aim the turret gun

In future I would like to add a lot more enemy and weapon types, as well as missions to travel to specific stars and maybe even a story of some kind.
